plot: A young and ambitious accounting clerk wakes up one morning with an infectious disease that only his parents can see. A power struggle ensues.
title: The Greens
plot_es: A young and ambitious accounting clerk wakes up one morning with an infectious disease that only his parents can see. A power struggle ensues.
plot_en: A young and ambitious accounting clerk wakes up one morning with an infectious disease that only his parents can see. A power struggle ensues.
